greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct prime divisors of 33...337 (with n 3s).
comment: Number of distinct prime factors of (10^(n + 1) - 1)/3 + 4. - _Stefan Steinerberger_, Mar 06 2006
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..199
example: The number of distinct prime divisors of 37 is 1 (prime).
The number of distinct prime divisors of 337 is 1 (prime).
The number of distinct prime divisors of 3337 is 2.
results.author: _Parthasarathy Nambi_, Apr 18 2005
